It experiences high volatility from seasonal demand booms and supply busts, with sharp reversals during inventory reports. Recent price weakness in 2024 from mild weather and oversupply has pushed it to multi-year lows, creating a classic mean reversion setup as winter heating demand or geopolitical events could spark a rapid reversal, aided by sector rotation into energy commodities.
